Entries.MeetTheCats: I love listening to Jean's stories, she's so smart. I have to be careful to wash my clothes when I get home, though. Dad's super-allergic.
Entries.ButteredJorts: Hahaha, poor Jorts! I bet Jean wasn't pleased at having to clean up after this one.$h
Entries.JortsZoomies: Sam told me about Jorts and Jean terrorizing Morris.  You love to see a grown man losing to a pair of cats.$h
Entries.OpenAllTheDoors: I can't believe Joja just...closed, like that. Sam said they didn't even bother clearing out the stock.

Entries.MeetTheCats: Those two neighborhood cats really like visiting my grandparents. Grandma really seems to love them, so they must be good company.
Entries.ButteredJorts: Grandma put aside some trimmings for Jean, but she refused. I guess she's feeling a little nauseated from cleaning off all that butter from Jorts.

Entries.MeetTheCats: I see Abigail with a couple of cats every now and then. They seem quite unusual, don't they?
Entries.ButteredJorts: You know, it's funny. Aside from being fished out of the trash can, Jorts doesn't seem to need us that much, but we do seem to need him.
Entries.OpenAllTheDoors: I'm very thankful Pierre's store managed to survive the presence of Jojamart. A lot of small shops like his in other towns aren't so lucky.

Entries.MeetTheCats: I don't know why those cats come around here so much. It's not like I feed them.
Entries.ButteredJorts: I get Pam was trying to help, but... butter?$s

Entries.MeetTheCats: Talking cats? Ah, I see, you're making a joke.$h#$b#Talking cats just isn't scientifically possible. They don't have adequate vocal cords or tongues to properly enunciate.
Entries.ButteredJorts: There's no studies to show that certain colors of cats have less intelligence than others.#$b#There is a wealth of anecdotal data, however, which is difficult to dismiss.

Entries.MeetTheCats: Sometimes those small furry creatures come to visit me when they're in the mines.#$b#Wish they'd buy something, though.
Entries.ButteredJorts: The small one seems annoyed lately. I think I'll stay clear of them.

Entries.MeetTheCats: @, do you believe that cats can talk?#$b#It's a fantasy, of course. But a fantasy can be both a thing that isn't real, and a thing you wish for.$h
Entries.ButteredJorts: I do hope Pam doesn't think we're laughing at her. No harm was done, and we know she means well.

Entries.MeetTheCats: Oh, Jorts and Jean? They're very special cats, aren't they?$h#$b#OF course, all cats are special!
Entries.ButteredJorts: I tried doing a crystal healing ritual on Jean to help her feel better. She fell asleep, so I guess it worked.
Entries.OpenAllTheDoors: Nature is healing. May the land that Joja poisoned be quickly reclaimed.$7

Entries.MeetTheCats: Jorts and Jean are such sweet cats. Sometimes I give them a little salami, as a treat. Don't tell George, though.
Entries.ButteredJorts: No one is mad at Pam for trying to help. On the contrary, I think we all learned that sometimes what we think will help isn't what someone else needs.

Entries.MeetTheCats: Those two cats are always trying to sleep on my lap. Haven't the heart to shove 'em off though. Not like I'm getting up, anyway.
Entries.ButteredJorts: Hmph, it wasn't even *real* butter, just margarine. That'll make a cat sick.
Entries.OpenAllTheDoors: I heard those kids at the Jojamart were trying to form a union. Good on 'em. That's the proper way workers looked out for each other when I was young.

Entries.MeetTheCats: They're good cats, @.#$b#*snore*
Entries.ButteredJorts: Marlon, you're not allowed to butter a coworker.#$b#*snore*

Entries.MeetTheCats: The cats like to slip in for scraps every so often. Jean's even smart enough to open the door on her own.#$b#And Jorts, never saw a cat that liked yams so much!$h
Entries.ButteredJorts: I guess I was being a little insensitive. Cats still have feelings, same as anyone else.$2#$b#I'll make it up to him with some yams in gravy.
Entries.DumpsterFishing: I guess I'll have to make my zucchini fritters tonight...#$b#Hm? Oh, it's nothing.$h

Entries.MeetTheCats: That orange cat is smart enough to get IN to my trash can no matter what I do, but not smart enough to get OUT.$3
Entries.ButteredJorts: Butter? I don't see the problem. That's not the worst thing Jean has had to lick off him.

Entries.MeetTheCats: Talking cats? You could be having auditory hallucinations, @. If you'd like, I can run some tests.
Entries.ButteredJorts: Hygiene is important, but putting an oily substance on a furry animal is the opposite of hygenic.$s
Entries.RubberCatting: Hm? Oh, yes, Kent was just in here, though I can't tell you what for. Privacy rules.#$b#Though speaking in generalities, I'm always happy when people come to me for help. Medicine can do amazing things, but the person has to want the help first.$h
Entries.JortsZoomies: I wonder what prompted such a tear from Jorts? I only know human psychology, not animal.

Entries.MeetTheCats: Jorts is so nice! One time I fell and scraped my knee, and Jorts licked it til it felt better.$h#$b#When I told Aunt Marnie, she made me scrub it clean, though.$s
Entries.ButteredJorts: I wish I could've seen Jorts with butter on him. I bet he was cute!
Entries.JortsZoomies: I asked Uncle Shane about Jorts running around the Jojamart since he was working, but he won't tell me.$s#$b#He just keeps looking at some paper in his room.
Entries.OpenAllTheDoors: Uncle Shane seems really down about the Jojamart closing. I wish I had some way of cheering him up.$2

Entries.MeetTheCats: I hope those two kitties have a good place to sleep at night.$s#$b#I'd consider letting them inside our house, but I just don't have the time to take care of a pet, too.
Entries.ButteredJorts: I understand where Pam's coming from...Jorts seems to need a lot of care. I guess that's why he has Jean.
Entries.RubberCatting: Kent told me he wants to try therapy, @. I never thought that kind of thing, just talking, would help.$s#$b#But if Kent does, I'll trust him. He's my husband, after all.$h

Entries.MeetTheCats: Some nights those cats just come and sit with me by the river. Makes me feel at peace.$h
Entries.ButteredJorts: Haha. I haven't had a story quite this silly since the 'Noodle Incident' in basic training.$h
Entries.RubberCatting: Hope is an interesting thing, isn't it? Just the chance that something might improve makes things seem better.$h

Entries.MeetTheCats: Ah, yes, I know the two cats that are always together.#$b#Jean brings me fish to sell and Jorts is always so nice to talk to.$h
Entries.ButteredJorts: There's been quite a ruckus on the surface today. Did something happen to Jorts?

Entries.MeetTheCats: There's something almost magical about those cats, isn't there? I swear I've heard them talk before.$h
Entries.ButteredJorts: Aw, I wish I'd seen buttered Jorts, I bet it was cute. Maybe I'll create some art based on the idea.$h

Entries.MeetTheCats: Talking cats? Don't be ridiculous, @. Cats can't talk.#$b#And they certainly can't bully you over passing anti-corporate ordinances.$3
Entries.ButteredJorts: Is this what Pelican Town has come to? Buttering cats?

Entries.MeetTheCats: Jean comes to fish with me sometimes, while Jorts keeps us company.#$b#She's a good listener and he's a good talker. They work well together.$h
Entries.ButteredJorts: I know how Jorts feels. People sometimes try to 'fix' me, too.$s
Entries.DumpsterFishing: Thanks for keeping quiet about me, @. Jorts and I will make sure to be more courteous of the noise we make in the future.$h

Entries.MeetTheCats: I don't have to worry about rats nearly as much now that Jean visits my farm.$h#$b#And Jorts is a sweetie, Jas adores him.$h
Entries.ButteredJorts: Oh dear, poor Jorts. I hope this doesn't give the kids any ideas...$s
Entries.JortsZoomies: I heard Jorts caused a ruckus at Shane's work, but he's been really quiet about it. Did something else happen, I wonder?$3
Entries.OpenAllTheDoors: I know Shane must be disappointed about the Jojamart closing, but I'm really proud of him. He worked so hard to make that union a reality.$h

Entries.MeetTheCats: Smart cats, those two. They help Gil and me on patrol overnight.#$b#Always seem to know where they're needed in town, too. But maybe that's just because they're cats.
Entries.ButteredJorts: Shouldn't put butter on someone on the job. It's unprofessional.

Entries.MeetTheCats: Talking cats?#$b#Oh, I wonder if I could make them collars with little robotic cat-to-human translators? I bet that'd be fun!$3
Entries.ButteredJorts: Pam gave it a good try, but cats just aren't trainable like dogs are. They're not evolved to follow orders.$2

Entries.MeetTheCats: Those two cats? I always slip them my leftovers, they're real sweethearts. Sometimes I even think I hear them cheering me on or comforting me.$h
Entries.ButteredJorts: I guess I should trust that Jorts and Jean know what they need and stop interfering. I'll stick to fishing Jorts out of trash cans.$s#$b#But Gus better apologize to Jorts for what he said!$3
Entries.OpenAllTheDoors: Times are going to be a little tighter now that the Jojamart's gone. At least Jorts seems in high spirits like always.

Entries.MeetTheCats: Sometimes when my mom's had too much to drink, Jorts and Jean escort her home to make sure she gets here all right.#$b#They're like her guardian angels!$h
Entries.ButteredJorts: Oh, Mom....$s#$b#Please don't hold this against her, @. I really think she's learned something from this.

Entries.MeetTheCats: The cats?  I--achoo!--get allergies just thinking about them!
Entries.ButteredJorts: I can't believe Pam put margarine on Jorts!$3#$b#If you're going to apply butter products to a cat, it should be MY high-quality butter, not that cheap Joja imitation!$3
Entries.JortsZoomies: Serves Morris right, having those cats run around his store like that.$h#$b#...I hope they don't decide to try the same thing here.$s
Entries.OpenAllTheDoors: I still can't believe Joja's actually gone. I'm in shock that all it took was it standing up to them once. We should have done it years ago.

Entries.MeetTheCats: Don't tell Demetrius, but Sebby was talking to those two cats the other day. And get this, they were talking back!$h#$b#Demetrius would never believe me, though.$4
Entries.ButteredJorts: Oh dear. Well, Jorts doesn't seem to hold grudges, so Pam will probably be fine.$h

Entries.MeetTheCats: Oh, the talking cats? I've never heard them, but Seb and Abby have, and I believe them.
Entries.ButteredJorts: I know I shouldn't laugh, but... pfft!$h
Entries.RubberCatting: Dad's been looking a bit happier lately, since he started visiting Harvey. Maybe he made a friend?$h
Entries.JortsZoomies: Vincent got a real kick out of the story of Jorts running around the Jojamart.$h#$b#I, uh, didn't tell him about the flyer thing. I saved one from the trash, but....
Entries.OpenAllTheDoors: I'm kind of sad to see Jojamart gone. I actually was really looking forward to being in the union.$s#$b#It was kind of cool to be a part of something big, with everyone working for each other, you know?$10

Entries.MeetTheCats: Emily says there's a couple of talking cats in town, but I think she's just teasing me.#$b#The only thing they ever seem to say to me is 'more milk!'$h
Entries.ButteredJorts: Emily told me back in town they're putting butter on cats? Really, sweeties, what ARE you up to?$s

Entries.MeetTheCats: Of course Demetrius doesn't know Jean and Jorts talk. He doesn't listen to humans, let alone cats.
Entries.ButteredJorts: Oh man, if I was Pam, I'd watch my step for a while. Jean can really hold a grudge.$h
Entries.JortsZoomies: Sam showed me the flyer Jorts was passing out. It's a good idea. I'm a freelancer, so I don't get the same chance to bargain as a union would.
Entries.OpenAllTheDoors: Lousy Joja rats. They'd rather shut down the store altogether than deal with a union.$5

Entries.MeetTheCats: Is it just me, or are those cats kind of...weird? I feel like the little one in particular watches me a lot.$a
Entries.ButteredJorts: Even at my drunkest, I've never thought it was a good idea to put butter on a cat.
Entries.RubberCatting: Harvey said he's trying to get together a support group for us guys to talk about stuff. Apparently there's a lot of men around here going through stuff.#$b#I don't know about talking about my feelings to a bunch of strangers... but I was willing to give therapy a try, so maybe....
Entries.JortsZoomies: ....$3#$b#What? I'm just... thinking about stuff. I have a lot on my mind, you know.$5
Entries.OpenAllTheDoors: ...I don't know if I made a mistake. Maybe I shouldn't have pushed for it. But I guess there's no undoing it.$3

Entries.MeetTheCats: Jorts and Jean are really cool! Wanna know a secret about them?#$b#Don't tell the adults, but they can talk!$h
Entries.ButteredJorts: Hee hee, Jorts was telling me about the butter! That's so funny!
Entries.RubberCatting: Hey @, what's pee-tee-ess-dee? I overheard Mom and Dad talking about it.#$b#When I asked Miss Penny, she said that it was a sickness. Am I gonna get sick?$s
Entries.JortsZoomies: I asked Jorts if he can show me how fast he can run, and he said he'd do zoomies just for me!$H

Entries.MeetTheCats: That Jean is one of the smartest cats I've ever seen. Good fishing cat. Jorts... well, he's very gentle.
Entries.ButteredJorts: Seems everyone's heard about the butter incident.#$b#Well, it'll keep 'em from talking about me crabs for a while.$h

Entries.MeetTheCats: Jorts and Jean? They are not arcane creatures. You have nothing to fear from them.#$b#They are cats: ordinary, yet extraordinary. It is best if you do not pry too far into the whys of it.
Entries.ButteredJorts: No, I will not look into a spell to make Jorts smarter. He is happy as he is.#$b#Intelligence does not equate happiness. Ask me how I know....

Entries.MeetTheCats: Jean's a nice cat. Always knows what to say to cheer me up.#$b#D-don't tell anyone I said that, though! Especially not Lucikiel!$4
Entries.ButteredJorts: Don't tell anyone, but Lucikiel is pretty fond of Jean.#$b#I'm glad she wasn't hurt, otherwise Pelican Town might be short one Pam....$4
Haha. I haven't had a story quite this silly since Toshinori managed to knock over an entire tent complex by smacking his forehead into a support beam.$h

Entries.MeetTheCats: Jorts and Jean like to hang out with Mr. Ginger when I play. I'm glad they're such good friends.$h
Entries.ButteredJorts: I told Mr. Ginger about what happened to Jorts. It almost sounded like he was laughing....

Entries.MeetTheCats: When those two cats get together with Mr. Ginger, I feel like they're gossiping about me.#$b#I guess that's just being paranoid.
Entries.ButteredJorts: I wonder if I could get away with doing that to Mr. Ginger, haha.$h#$b#Nah, I'd better not try. He'd probably put a dead mouse in my drink.#$b#...again.$2

Entries.MeetTheCats: With so many cats around, I don't have to worry about rats nearly as much as I used to.$h#$b#Though, if little Jean decides she fancies one of the boys, we may have TOO many cats....
Entries.ButteredJorts: Oh dear, poor Jorts. I hope Jas doesn't get any ideas with Mr. Ginger... I don't think he'll put up with that.

Entries.MeetTheCats: Well, yes, I petted the kitty, but I had no choice.#$b#I definitely didn't enjoy petting his very soft fur or anything.
Entries.ButteredJorts: Why would you put butter on a cat? Maybe Pam was trying to eat him?#$b#Not that I care about that big soft fluffball or anything.

Entries.MeetTheCats: The big orange kitty said hi to me and let me pet him!  I wonder if the little one will come see me, too?$13
Entries.ButteredJorts: Is Mr. Jorts okay? Void said that he'd be fine, but I'm worried.$2

Entries.MeetTheCats: Talking cats, huh? This town is more than it appears to be.$9
Entries.ButteredJorts: HAHAHA! I can't believe Pam buttered Jorts!$1
Entries.JortsZoomies: Are we sure Morris doesn't actually like being humiliated? Between myself and a pair of cats, he seems to be excellent at embarrassing losses.$1
Entries.OpenAllTheDoors: It's a shame I couldn't give Morris one more humiliation for the road.$1#$b#Let's hope his vices continue to 'bless' him in the future.$7

Entries.MeetTheCats: true

Entries.ButteredJorts: true

Changes.LogName: Open all the Doors Lasting CT
